hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right
